 Introduce or eliminate a disjunct in a uniqueness quantifier. (Contributed by NM, 21-Oct-2005.)  (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 9-Jul-2011.)
statement: euor2 $p |- ( -. E. x ph -> ( E! x ( ph \/ ps ) <-> E! x ps ) ) $.
